title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 300.3 - Hospital records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 300.3 - Hospital records

State Regulations

All hospital records in any pending claim for compensation
or true copies thereof coming into the possession of the employer or insurance
carrier shall be filed with the chairman, upon the order of the board. When
directed by the board the employer or carrier shall subpoena hospital records
and produce same at a hearing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
300.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
